document_data.caption: ''A table dice set sold by [[Aurora's Emporium]].''
document_data.name: Table dice
document_data.mainbody: '''Table dice''', or '''backgammon''', was a board game played with [[dice]].
document_data.Description: The sets sold through [[Aurora's Emporium]] used polished stone markers, [[ivory]] dice, and a leather dice cup. The entire set could be transported in an [[ironwood]] case.
document_data.Reputation: Table dice was commonly played as a tavern game in the [[Dalelands]]. As of [[1359 DR]], its popularity had begun to spread to the [[Western Heartlands]] and the [[North Faer√ªn|North]].
